On Apr 14, 2007, at 6:56 PM, petar_chervenski wrote:

> guess the particular application of the NN is important at all.

Yes, I think it exactly boils down to this.  If I have a network to  
compute something like an 11 bit XOR, I want to give it the input,  
and get the result.

Still, NEAT will adapt to whatever you're doing.

--Steve
--Apple-Mail-9-732352659
